PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_ComplexDescReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a local device wishing to inquire as to the complex descriptor of a remote device. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address for the complex descriptor request.

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a local device wishing to inquire as to the complex descriptor of a remote device. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device.
